Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.A1708: What is A1708? A1708 is a model number for a 13 inch size MacBook Pro Retina from years Mid 2017, 2016 with EMC 3164, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-00840, 820-00875..

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1708</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> freezes opening lid
threads.message:
Hi, I have an <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1708</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> non Touch Bar MBP and the issue I have is that when you open the screen past 30degrees the Mac freezes. The mouse cursor stops moving. I have done an NVRAM and SMC Reset, booted to an external macOS disk and the issue persists. I am wondering if it is the same as this video -- [MEDIA=youtube]NzjoELvrkYo[/MEDIA] , here you guys say that its one the screen flex cables which can not be replaced and a new screen is required. Can you advise on this please ? 

Thanks Bob

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1708</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> freezes opening lid
threads.message:
Very likely, if the problem only appears when rotate the lid.
Check first if the machine isn't still covered by Apple screen replacement program.

The best way to confirm the issue, test with known good LCD assembly.
